ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Jackpot!!!: The Joes have downloaded information from the Silent Castle's computers that reveal the Commander's plans to take over the U.S. to the Pentagon. As they're escaping, Snake-Eyes is captured by Billy and later placed under Dr. Venom's brainwave scanner as Storm Shadow aids Scarlett in her escape. Meanwhile, at the Pentagon, Hawk awaits the ok from the President before Cobra troopers are disarmed and placed into custody by the U.S. military.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:28. [CVDB239041] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:17. [Issue ID 774316]
